i18n.eng: I May Be a Guild Receptionist, but I`ll Solo Any Boss to Clock Out on Time
i18n.qro: Guild no Uketsukejô Desu ga, Zangyô wa Iya nano de Boss wo Solo Tôbatsu Shiyô to Omoimasu
i18n.jpn: ギルドの受付嬢ですが, 残業は嫌なのでボスをソロ討伐しようと思います
i18n.chi: 虽然是公会的前台小姐，因为讨厌加班，所以打算自己讨伐boss

tag.name: Guild no Uketsukejô Desu ga, Zangyô wa Iya nano de Boss wo Solo Tôbatsu Shiyô to Omoimasu
